dataQuery.sqlStatement: select to_char(cb.creation_date, 'MM-DD-YYYY') creation_date, cb.incident_attribute_5 name, cb.incident_attribute_8 email_address, cb.incident_attribute_14 phone_no, xt.item_number||'-'||xt.item_description Item_details from xx_cs_sr_items_link xt, cs_incidents_all_b cb where xt.service_request_id = cb.incident_id and cb.problem_code = 'TDS-SERVICES' and trunc(cb.creation_date) BETWEEN nvl(to_date(:p_start_date,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), trunc(sysdate-7)) AND nvl(to_date(:p_end_date,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), trunc(sysdate-1)) order by creation_date desc
